TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TextInfo extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback
Public Class TextInfo Implements ICloneable, IDeserializationCallback

summary.span: 定義文字屬性和行為，例如書寫系統特有的大小寫。

span.span: Defines text properties and behaviors, such as casing, that are specific to a writing system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 書寫系統是指令碼和表示為文字的語言所需的拼字規則的集合。A writing system is the collection of scripts and orthographic rules required to represent a language as text. 類別代表書寫系統。The class represents a writing system. 應用程式應該使用屬性，以取得特定物件物件。The application should use the property to obtain the object for a particular object. 如果安全性決策是根據字串比較或大小寫變更作業而定，應用程式應該使用屬性所傳回的物件屬性，以確保作業的行為一致不管作業系統的文化特性設定。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the property of the object returned by the property to ensure that the behavior of the operation is consistent regardless of the operating system culture settings. ## OverridesOverrides 使用者可能會使用控制台中的 地區及語言選項部分覆寫目前的文化特性的 Windows 與相關聯的值。The user might use the regional and language options portion of Control Panel to override the values associated with the current culture of Windows. 例如，使用者可能會選擇不同的格式顯示日期，或使用文化特性的預設值不同的貨幣。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 如果屬性設定為`true`，所傳回的物件的屬性值， ，和屬性也會擷取從使用者設定。If the property is set to `true`, the property values of the objects returned by the , , and properties are also retrieved from the user settings. 如果使用者設定都與相關聯的文化特性不相容，例如，如果選取的行事曆不是其中一個，未定義該方法的結果和屬性的值。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the , for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the , the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined.

value.span: 目前 所代表書寫系統使用的 ANSI 字碼頁。

span.span: The ANSI code page used by the writing system represented by the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新成員的複製品不是唯讀的。The new memberwise clone is not read-only. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範和方法。The following code example demonstrates the and methods. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CultureName As String
public: property System::String ^ CultureName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得文化特性的名稱，這個文化特性與目前 物件關聯。

span.span: Gets the name of the culture associated with the current object.
The name of a culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A特定文化特性，從建立物件和屬性會傳回該文化特性名稱。A object is created from a specific culture, and the property returns the name of that culture. 屬性永遠會反映特定文化特性，而不是中性文化特性。The property always reflects a specific culture rather than a neutral culture. 如果已做為它的值，則對應的中性文化特性其值為具有任意的特定文化特性使用相同的語言。If has a neutral culture as its value, then the corresponding has as its value an arbitrary specific culture that uses the same language. 例如，屬性會傳回"en"英文的中性文化特性，但對應屬性可能會傳回"EN-US"代表英文 （美國） 文化特性。For example, the property returns "en" for the English neutral culture, but the corresponding property might return "en-US" for the English (United States) culture. 如果物件都與特定的文化特性，而不是中性文化特性的值及其屬性一定是相同及其相關聯的屬性值物件。If the object is associated with a specific culture instead of a neutral culture, the value of its property is always identical to the property value of its associated object. 同樣地，屬性永遠不會反映特定排序。Similarly, the property never reflects a particular sort. 它一律會對應至預設的排序次序。It always corresponds to a default sort order. 例如，西班牙文 （西班牙） 的預設排序次序是國際排序順序。For example, the default sort order for Spanish (Spain) is the international sort order. 如果是 es ES_tradnl （傳統排序順序的西班牙文） 則對應是 ES-ES （西班牙文的預設國際排序順序）。If is es-ES_tradnl (Spanish with the traditional sort order) then the corresponding is es-ES (Spanish with the default international sort order).

summary.span: 做為目前 的雜湊函式，適用於雜湊演算法與資料結構，例如雜湊表。

A hash code for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 這個方法會為兩個物件產生相同雜湊程式碼，這兩個物件根據 方法是相等的物件。This method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the method.

span.span: if the current object is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，應用程式無法變更的目前屬性的任何物件。If the property is `true`, the application cannot change any of the properties of the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRightToLeft As Boolean
public: property bool IsRightToLeft { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出目前 物件是否表示從右到左書寫文字的書寫系統。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the current object represents a writing system where text flows from right to left.

value.span: 如果從右到左書寫文字，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if text flows from right to left; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示基準書寫文字的方向和使用者介面項目，例如按鈕和捲軸的相對位置。The property indicates the dominant direction of written text and the relative position of user interface elements such as buttons and scroll bars.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LCID As Integer
public: property int LCID { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得與目前 物件關聯之文化特性的文化特性識別項。

span.span: Gets the culture identifier for the culture associated with the current object.

value.span: 識別文化特性的數字，目前的 物件就是從該文化特性建立的。

span.span: A number that identifies the culture from which the current object was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些預先定義的文化特性名稱，這和中的其他類別所使用的識別項命名空間，以及 Windows API。Certain predefined culture names and identifiers are used by this and other classes in the namespace, as well as the Windows API. 詳細的文化特性資訊定義於[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考主題，網址 Go Global 開發人員中心](http://msdn.microsoft.com/goglobal/bb896001.aspx)。The detailed culture information is defined in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference topic at the Go Global Developer Center](http://msdn.microsoft.com/goglobal/bb896001.aspx). 屬性永遠會反映的特定文化特性識別項，而非中性文化特性識別項。The property always reflects a specific culture identifier instead of a neutral culture identifier. 如果設定為對應的中性文化特性識別項具有做為其值會使用相同的語言的任意的特定文化特性識別項。If is set to a neutral culture identifier, the corresponding has as its value an arbitrary specific culture identifier that uses the same language. 例如，屬性會傳回 0x0009 英文的中性文化特性，名為"en"。For example, the property returns 0x0009 for the English neutral culture, named "en". 不過，對應屬性可能會傳回 0x0409 英文 （美國） 文化特性，名為 EN-US。However, the corresponding property might return 0x0409 for the English (United States) culture, named en-US. 同樣地，屬性一律會對應至預設的排序次序，而且永遠不會反映特定的排序次序。Similarly, the property always corresponds to a default sort order, and never reflects a specific sort order. 例如，西班牙文 （西班牙） 的預設排序次序是國際排序順序。For example, the default sort order for Spanish (Spain) is the international sort order. 如果設為"0x040A 」 （傳統排序順序西班牙文），對應值是"0x0C0A 」 （西班牙文的預設國際排序順序）。If is set to "0x040A" (Spanish with the traditional sort order), the corresponding value is "0x0C0A" (Spanish with the default international sort order).

summary.span: 將指定字元或字串轉換為小寫。

span.span: Converts the specified character or string to lowercase.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance char ToLower(char c) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ToLower (c As Char) As Char

span.span: The character to convert to lowercase.

summary.span: 將指定字元轉換為小寫。

span.span: Converts the specified character to lowercase.

returns.span: 轉換為小寫的指定字元。

span.span: The specified character converted to lowercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大小寫語法取決於使用的文化特性。Casing semantics depend on the culture in use. 而異的文化特性，大小寫語法不區分文化特性。For the invariant culture, the casing semantics are not culture-sensitive. 特定文化特性，是區分文化特性的大小寫語意。For a specific culture, the casing semantics are sensitive to that culture. 如果安全性決策是根據字串比較或大小寫變更作業而定，應用程式應該使用來確保行為一致，不論系統的文化特性設定為何。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the to ensure that the behavior is consistent regardless of the culture settings of the system. 不過，只要需要文化特性無關的結果，例如系統服務的處理序必須使用文化特性而異。However, the invariant culture must be used only by processes that require culture-independent results, such as system services. 否則，它會產生可能是語法不正確或文化特性上適當的結果。Otherwise, it produces results that might be linguistically incorrect or culturally inappropriate. 如需有關的文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on cultures, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會變更大小寫的字串，根據英文 （美國） 文化特性，以文化特性名稱 EN-US。The following code example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ToLower(string str) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ToLower (str As String) As String

span.span: The string to convert to lowercase.

summary.span: 將指定字串轉換為小寫。

span.span: Converts the specified string to lowercase.

returns.span: 轉換為小寫的指定字串。

span.span: The specified string converted to lowercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的字串可能會從輸入字串的長度不同。The returned string might differ in length from the input string. 如需有關大小寫的詳細資訊，請參閱 Unicode 技術報表 #21 「 案例對應 」，由 Unicode Consortium 發佈 (http://www.unicode.org)。For more information on casing, refer to the Unicode Technical Report #21 "Case Mappings," published by the Unicode Consortium (http://www.unicode.org). 目前的實作會保留字串的長度。The current implementation preserves the length of the string. 不過，這種行為並不一定都可能在未來變更的實作。However, this behavior is not guaranteed and could change in future implementations. 大小寫語法取決於使用的文化特性。Casing semantics depend on the culture in use. 而異的文化特性，大小寫語法不區分文化特性。For the invariant culture, the casing semantics are not culture-sensitive. 特定文化特性，是區分文化特性的大小寫語意。For a specific culture, the casing semantics are sensitive to that culture. 如果安全性決策是根據字串比較或大小寫變更作業而定，應用程式應該使用來確保行為一致，不論系統的文化特性設定為何。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the to ensure that the behavior is consistent regardless of the culture settings of the system. 不過，只要需要文化特性無關的結果，例如系統服務的處理序必須使用文化特性而異。However, the invariant culture must be used only by processes that require culture-independent results, such as system services. 否則，它會產生可能是語法不正確或文化特性上適當的結果。Otherwise, it produces results that might be linguistically incorrect or culturally inappropriate. 如需有關的文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on cultures, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會變更大小寫的字串，根據英文 （美國） 文化特性，以文化特性名稱 EN-US。The following code example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)]

span.span: is null.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回表示目前 的字串。

span.span: Returns a string that represents the current .
A string that represents the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToTitleCase(string str) cil managed
Public Function ToTitleCase (str As String) As String

param.name: str
param.span: 要轉換為字首大寫的字串。

span.span: The string to convert to title case.

summary.span: 將指定的字串轉換為字首大寫 (除了視為縮略字的完全大寫文字例外)。

span.span: Converts the specified string to title case (except for words that are entirely in uppercase, which are considered to be acronyms).

returns.span: 轉換為字首大寫的指定字串。

span.span: The specified string converted to title case.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，標題大小寫會轉換成大寫的單字的第一個字元，其餘字元為小寫。Generally, title casing converts the first character of a word to uppercase and the rest of the characters to lowercase. 不過，這個方法目前不提供適當的大小寫轉換為全部大寫，例如縮略字。However, this method does not currently provide proper casing to convert a word that is entirely uppercase, such as an acronym. 下表顯示方法的方式呈現數個字串。The following table shows the way the method renders several strings. |輸入Input|語言Language|預期的結果Expected result|實際的結果Actual result| |-----------|--------------|---------------------|-------------------| |war 和安心war and peace|英文English|War 和安心War and Peace|War 和安心War And Peace| |每個 anhalter durch 死 GalaxisPer anhalter durch die Galaxis|德文German|每個 Anhalter durch 死 GalaxisPer Anhalter durch die Galaxis|每個 Anhalter Durch 死 GalaxisPer Anhalter Durch Die Galaxis| |les naufragés d'ythaqles naufragés d'ythaq|法文French|Les Naufragés d'YthaqLes Naufragés d'Ythaq|Les Naufragés D'ythaqLes Naufragés D'ythaq| 如上所示方法會提供不一定而言語言正確的任意大小寫行為。As illustrated above, the method provides an arbitrary casing behavior which is not necessarily linguistically correct. 而言語言正確的解決方案需要額外的規則，並對目前的演算法是稍微更簡單且更快速。A linguistically correct solution would require additional rules, and the current algorithm is somewhat simpler and faster. 我們會保留在未來執行此應用程式開發介面速度較慢的權限。We reserve the right to make this API slower in the future. 目前的實作方法會產生與輸入字串長度相同的輸出字串。The current implementation of the method yields an output string that is the same length as the input string. 不過，這種行為並不一定都可能會在未來實作變更。However, this behavior is not guaranteed and could change in a future implementation. ## Examples 下列範例會變更大小寫的字串，根據英文 （美國） 文化特性，以文化特性名稱 EN-US。The following example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)] 下列範例會將陣列中的每個字串傳遞給 方法。The following example passes each string in an array to the method. 這些字串包含適當的字首大寫字串和縮略字。The strings include proper title strings as well as acronyms. 使用 EN-US 文化特性的慣例，字串會轉換為字首大寫。The strings are converted to title case by using the conventions of the en-US culture. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo.ToTitleCase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.textinfo.totitlecase/cs/totitlecase2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo.ToTitleCase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.textinfo.totitlecase/vb/totitlecase2.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

summary.span: 將指定字元或字串轉換為大寫。

span.span: Converts the specified character or string to uppercase.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance char ToUpper(char c) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ToUpper (c As Char) As Char

span.span: The character to convert to uppercase.

summary.span: 將指定字元轉換為大寫。

span.span: Converts the specified character to uppercase.

returns.span: 轉換為大寫的指定字元。

span.span: The specified character converted to uppercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大小寫語法取決於使用的文化特性。Casing semantics depend on the culture in use. 而異的文化特性，大小寫語法不區分文化特性。For the invariant culture, the casing semantics are not culture-sensitive. 特定文化特性，是區分文化特性的大小寫語意。For a specific culture, the casing semantics are sensitive to that culture. 如果安全性決策是根據字串比較或大小寫變更作業而定，應用程式應該使用來確保行為一致，不論系統的文化特性設定為何。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the to ensure that the behavior is consistent regardless of the culture settings of the system. 不過，只要需要文化特性無關的結果，例如系統服務的處理序必須使用文化特性而異。However, the invariant culture must be used only by processes that require culture-independent results, such as system services. 否則，它會產生可能是語法不正確或文化特性上適當的結果。Otherwise, it produces results that might be linguistically incorrect or culturally inappropriate. 如需有關的文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on cultures, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會變更大小寫的字串，根據英文 （美國） 文化特性，以文化特性名稱 EN-US。The following code example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ToUpper(string str) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ToUpper (str As String) As String

span.span: The string to convert to uppercase.

summary.span: 將指定字串轉換為大寫。

span.span: Converts the specified string to uppercase.

returns.span: 轉換為大寫的指定字串。

span.span: The specified string converted to uppercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的字串可能會從輸入字串的長度不同。The returned string might differ in length from the input string. 如需有關大小寫的詳細資訊，請參閱 Unicode 技術報表 #21 「 案例對應 」，由 Unicode Consortium 發佈 (http://www.unicode.org)。For more information on casing, refer to the Unicode Technical Report #21 "Case Mappings," published by the Unicode Consortium (http://www.unicode.org). 目前的實作會保留字串的長度。The current implementation preserves the length of the string. 不過，這種行為並不一定都可能在未來變更的實作。However, this behavior is not guaranteed and could change in future implementations. 大小寫語法取決於使用的文化特性。Casing semantics depend on the culture in use. 而異的文化特性，大小寫語法不區分文化特性。For the invariant culture, the casing semantics are not culture-sensitive. 特定文化特性，是區分文化特性的大小寫語意。For a specific culture, the casing semantics are sensitive to that culture. 如果安全性決策是根據字串比較或大小寫變更作業而定，應用程式應該使用來確保行為一致，不論系統的文化特性設定為何。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the to ensure that the behavior is consistent regardless of the culture settings of the system. 不過，只要需要文化特性無關的結果，例如系統服務的處理序必須使用文化特性而異。However, the invariant culture must be used only by processes that require culture-independent results, such as system services. 否則，它會產生可能是語法不正確或文化特性上適當的結果。Otherwise, it produces results that might be linguistically incorrect or culturally inappropriate. 如需有關的文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on cultures, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會變更大小寫的字串，根據英文 （美國） 文化特性，以文化特性名稱 EN-US。The following code example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)]

span.span: is null.
